Title: Requires signage alerting motorists of red light cameras in the areas where red light camera demonstration programs have been authorized
Summary: Requires signage alerting motorists of red light cameras in the areas where red light camera demonstration programs have been authorized.
LawCode: Add ยง1111-f, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring signage alerting motorists of red light cameras; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
